summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding Jeffrey Epstein's bail appeal, inquiring whether the appeal is being heard by the 2nd Circuit and whether it will involve live arguments or just court filings.

events.title: Inquiry about Epstein Bail Appeal
events.description: An email is sent from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York inquiring about the status of Jeffrey Epstein's bail appeal, specifically asking if it is being heard by the 2nd Circuit and whether there will be live arguments or just court filings.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 23, 2019, concerning Jeffrey Epstein's bail appeal.
The inquiry comes from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, specifically from a Public Affairs or Press Office contact.
The email asks whether the appeal is being heard by the 2nd Circuit and whether proceedings will involve live arguments or just court filings.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to Epstein's case following his arrest.
